Kourakuen is both a city and station in Tokyo.
There is one of famous garden called Kourakuen garden.
And There is a amusement park that is called Tokyo Dome City and a stadium with a retractable roof that is called Tokyo Dome.
Take the Tokyo-Metro-Marunouchi line from Tokyo to Kourakuen (9min).

Tokyo Dome is one of famous stadium with a retractable roof in Japan,Tokyo.
There are a lot of concerts of singers all over the world and baseball games that is both international games and internal games of Japanese baseball teams.
So in Tokyo Dome, you can see many concerts and baseball games.
It's near the Kourakuen station's exit 1 or 2.

It's a beautiful garden.
This garden is traditional both Japanese and Chinese landscape garden.
It was constructed by a famous Japanese historical person.

value: In front of Kourakuen station, (go out from exit 1 or 2) there is Tokyo Dome City Attractions that is a amusement park next to Tokyo Dome that is a big statium in Tokyo.

Tokyo Dome City Attractions is famous for a big and fearful roller coaster.
And there are some amusement arcades,so you can enjoy both a amusement park and a amusement arcades in there.

value: It is a big stadium in Tokyo.

In Tokyo Dome,you can buy a lot of baseball goods of 12 Japanese baseball teams and delegation of baseball in Japan.
For example, uniforms and goods for cheering.
And in there, you can watch a lot of baseball games expect winter season.

This is a flower shop in Koshirakawa,Kourakuen.There are a lot of flowers.
address is Tokyo-Bunkyouku-Koshirakawa1-17-1.

This is one of popular restaurants in Tokyo Dome.You can eat a lot of Spanish, American and Italian foods in there.For example,there are tacoses,humburger,rib-steak,pasta,cakes and pizza and so on.And there are liquor like beer,wine,sour and cocktail,too.
In addition,you can watch baseball games while you eat and drink there.

This cafe is in Tokyo Dome city.You can eat Finnish foods in this store.In addition,you are able to eat and drink with moomin and other charactors.

It is a big hotel near Tokyo Dome.
Get out fronm Kourakuen station's exit 1 or 2,you can get in there soon(about 5min).
